disketaa_caustics.name: Caustics
disketaa_caustics.description: Generates a dynamic water caustic light patterns.

color.name: Color
color.desc: Sets the color of the caustic light patterns.

speed.name: Speed
speed.desc: Adjusts the animation speed multiplier for the moving light patterns.

threshold.name: Threshold
threshold.desc: Controls the minimum brightness for caustics to appear.

sharpness.name: Sharpness
sharpness.desc: Controls the edge definition of caustic patterns.

glow_intensity.name: Glow intensity
glow_intensity.desc: Creates white glow at the center of caustic lines.

glow_threshold.name: Glow threshold
glow_threshold.desc: Sets the minimum value for glow to appear.

opacity_variation.name: Opacity variation
opacity_variation.desc: Adds smooth opacity gradients across the caustic patterns for more natural look.
